description: Number of distinct primes = 3 mod 4 dividing n.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: Additive with a(p^e) = 1 if p = 3 (mod 4), 0 otherwise.
prog: (PARI) for(n=1,100,print1(sumdiv(n,d,isprime(d)*if((d-3)%4,0,1)),","))(Haskell)a005091 = sum . map a079261 . a027748_row-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jan 07 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
